experiences.description: OLibrary is a web application for library management (book, ebook, librarians, etc.), built with PHP Framework, Laravel and using MySQL DBMS. Working as a frontend, also backend.
Working as a code reviewer, make an assessment to submitted projects, also answer the forum discussion and provide solution, suggestion to student's submission.
Building a Restful API using PHP Framework, Laravel for many of projects. Also debugging and make sure the code more efficient and less query.
